Html:
Hi, 

I noticed during my test that cross-references inside sheet and cell (ex. =Sheet2! D14) are yet not implemented.
I did not find any information on this in the documentation.

Does this feature will be implemented (here I speak only of internal cross-references - between sheets), or do we must find a way around it ?

Thanks.

OUPS ... SORRY !

I just notice that it works with getCalculatedValue() instead of getValue().
However the cross-reference inside formula doesn't run. Could you please confirm me or explain how to use them.

Thanks.
This has already been fixed in SVN. The original logged problem was Work Item 13515

Ok it run now.

Thank you Mark.
